093/**
094 * The Class VmViewer.
095 */
096@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.ExcessiveImports",
097    "PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects", "PMD.GodClass", "PMD.TooManyMethods" })
098public class VmViewer extends FreeMarkerConlet<VmViewer.ViewerModel> {
099
100    private static final String VM_NAME_PROPERTY = "vmName";
101    private static final String RENDERED
102        = VmViewer.class.getName() + ".rendered";
103    private static final String PENDING
104        = VmViewer.class.getName() + ".pending";
105    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
106        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.Edit);
107    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES_FOR_GENERATED = RenderMode.asSet(
108        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.StickyPreview);
109    private final ChannelCache<String, VmChannel,
110            VmDefinitionModel> channelManager = new ChannelCache<>();
111    private static ObjectMapper objectMapper
112        = new ObjectMapper().registerModule(new JavaTimeModule());
113    private Class<?> preferredIpVersion = Inet4Address.class;
114    private final Set<String> syncUsers = new HashSet<>();
115    private final Set<String> syncRoles = new HashSet<>();
116
117    /**
118     * The periodically generated update event.
119     */
120    public static class Update extends Event<Void> {
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
125     * 
126     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
127     * on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
128     * sends the event to
129     */
130    public VmViewer(Channel componentChannel) {
131        super(componentChannel);
132    }
133
134    /**
135     * Configure the component.
136     *
137     * @param event the event
138     */
139    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
140    @Handler
141    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
142        event.structured(componentPath()).ifPresent(c -> {
143            try {
144                var dispRes = (Map<String, Object>) c
145                    .getOrDefault("displayResource", Collections.emptyMap());
146                switch ((String) dispRes.getOrDefault("preferredIpVersion",
147                    "")) {
148                case "ipv6":
149                    preferredIpVersion = Inet6Address.class;
150                    break;
151                case "ipv4":
152                default:
153                    preferredIpVersion = Inet4Address.class;
154                    break;
155                }
156
157                // Sync
158                for (var entry : (List<Map<String, String>>) c.getOrDefault(
159                    "syncPreviewsFor", Collections.emptyList())) {
160                    if (entry.containsKey("user")) {
161                        syncUsers.add(entry.get("user"));
162                    } else if (entry.containsKey("role")) {
163                        syncRoles.add(entry.get("role"));
164                    }
165                }
166            } catch (ClassCastException e) {
167                logger.config("Malformed configuration: " + e.getMessage());
168            }
169        });
170    }
171
172    private boolean syncPreviews(Session session) {
173        return WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
174            .filter(u -> syncUsers.contains(u.getName())).isPresent()
175            || WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
176                .filter(cr -> syncRoles.contains(cr.getName())).findAny()
177                .isPresent();
178    }
179
180    /**
181     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
182     *
183     * @param event the event
184     * @param channel the channel
185     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
186     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
187     *             exception
188     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
189     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
190     */
191    @Handler
192    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleConnection channel)
193            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
194            ParseException, IOException {
195        // Add conlet resources to page
196        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
197            .setDisplayNames(
198                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
199            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview)
200            .addScript(new ScriptResource().setScriptType("module")
201                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
202                    type(), "VmViewer-functions.js"))));
203        channel.session().put(RENDERED, new HashSet<>());
204    }
205
206    /**
207     * On console configured.
208     *
209     * @param event the event
210     * @param connection the console connection
211     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
212     */
213    @Handler
214    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
215    public void onConsoleConfigured(ConsoleConfigured event,
216            ConsoleConnection connection) throws InterruptedException,
217            IOException {
218        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
219        final var rendered = (Set<String>) connection.session().get(RENDERED);
220        connection.session().remove(RENDERED);
221        if (!syncPreviews(connection.session())) {
222            return;
223        }
224
225        boolean foundMissing = false;
226        for (var vmName : accessibleVms(connection)) {
227            if (rendered.contains(vmName)) {
228                continue;
229            }
230            if (!foundMissing) {
231                // Suspending to allow rendering of conlets to be noticed
232                var failSafe = Components.schedule(t -> event.resumeHandling(),
233                    Duration.ofSeconds(1));
234                event.suspendHandling(failSafe::cancel);
235                connection.setAssociated(PENDING, event);
236                foundMissing = true;
237            }
238            fire(new AddConletRequest(event.event().event().renderSupport(),
239                VmViewer.class.getName(),
240                RenderMode.asSet(RenderMode.Preview))
241                    .addProperty(VM_NAME_PROPERTY, vmName),
242                connection);
243        }
244    }
245
246    /**
247     * On console prepared.
248     *
249     * @param event the event
250     * @param connection the connection
251     */
252    @Handler
253    public void onConsolePrepared(ConsolePrepared event,
254            ConsoleConnection connection) {
255        if (syncPreviews(connection.session())) {
256            connection.respond(new UpdateConletType(type()));
257        }
258    }
259
260    private String storagePath(Session session, String conletId) {
261        return "/" + WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
262            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("")
263            + "/" + VmViewer.class.getName() + "/" + conletId;
264    }
265
266    @Override
267    protected Optional<ViewerModel> createNewState(AddConletRequest event,
268            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
269        var model = new ViewerModel(conletId);
270        model.vmName = (String) event.properties().get(VM_NAME_PROPERTY);
271        if (model.vmName != null) {
272            model.setGenerated(true);
273        }
274        String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
275        connection.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
276            storagePath(connection.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
277        return Optional.of(model);
278    }
279
280    @Override
281    protected Optional<ViewerModel> createStateRepresentation(Event<?> event,
282            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
283        var model = new ViewerModel(conletId);
284        String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
285        connection.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
286            storagePath(connection.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
287        return Optional.of(model);
288    }
289
290    @Override
291    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.EmptyCatchBlock")
292    protected Optional<ViewerModel> recreateState(Event<?> event,
293            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId) throws Exception {
294        KeyValueStoreQuery query = new KeyValueStoreQuery(
295            storagePath(channel.session(), conletId), channel);
296        newEventPipeline().fire(query, channel);
297        try {
298            if (!query.results().isEmpty()) {
299                var json = query.results().get(0).values().stream().findFirst()
300                    .get();
301                ViewerModel model
302                    = objectMapper.readValue(json, ViewerModel.class);
303                return Optional.of(model);
304            }
305        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
306            // Means we have no result.
307        }
308
309        // Fall back to creating default state.
310        return createStateRepresentation(event, channel, conletId);
311    }
312
313    @Override
314    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "unchecked" })
315    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
316            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, ViewerModel model)
317            throws Exception {
318        ResourceBundle resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
319        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = new HashSet<>();
320        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
321            channel.associated(PENDING, Event.class)
322                .ifPresent(e -> {
323                    e.resumeHandling();
324                    channel.setAssociated(PENDING, null);
325                });
326
327            // Remove conlet if definition has been removed
328            if (model.vmName() != null
329                && !channelManager.associated(model.vmName()).isPresent()) {
330                channel.respond(
331                    new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
332                return Collections.emptySet();
333            }
334
335            // Don't render if user has not at least one permission
336            if (model.vmName() != null
337                && channelManager.associated(model.vmName())
338                    .map(d -> permissions(d, channel.session()).isEmpty())
339                    .orElse(true)) {
340                return Collections.emptySet();
341            }
342
343            // Render
344            Template tpl
345                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmViewer-preview.ftl.html");
346            channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
347                processTemplate(event, tpl,
348                    fmModel(event, channel, conletId, model)))
349                        .setRenderAs(
350                            RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
351                        .setSupportedModes(
352                            model.isGenerated() ? MODES_FOR_GENERATED : MODES));
353            renderedAs.add(RenderMode.Preview);
354            if (!Strings.isNullOrEmpty(model.vmName())) {
355                Optional.ofNullable(channel.session().get(RENDERED))
356                    .ifPresent(s -> ((Set<String>) s).add(model.vmName()));
357                updateConfig(channel, model);
358            }
359        }
360        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Edit)) {
361            Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
362                .getTemplate("VmViewer-edit.ftl.html");
363            var fmModel = fmModel(event, channel, conletId, model);
364            fmModel.put("vmNames", accessibleVms(channel));
365            channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), conletId,
366                processTemplate(event, tpl, fmModel))
367                    .addOption("cancelable", true)
368                    .addOption("okayLabel",
369                        resourceBundle.getString("okayLabel")));
370        }
371        return renderedAs;
372    }
373
374    private List<String> accessibleVms(ConsoleConnection channel) {
375        return channelManager.associated().stream()
376            .filter(d -> !permissions(d, channel.session()).isEmpty())
377            .map(d -> d.getMetadata().getName()).sorted().toList();
378    }
379
380    private Set<Permission> permissions(VmDefinitionModel vmDef,
381            Session session) {
382        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
383            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
384        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session)
385            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
386        return vmDef.permissionsFor(user, roles);
387    }
388
389    private void updateConfig(ConsoleConnection channel, ViewerModel model) {
390        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
391            model.getConletId(), "updateConfig", model.vmName()));
392        updateVmDef(channel, model);
393    }
394
395    private void updateVmDef(ConsoleConnection channel, ViewerModel model) {
396        if (Strings.isNullOrEmpty(model.vmName())) {
397            return;
398        }
399        channelManager.associated(model.vmName()).ifPresent(vmDef -> {
400            try {
401                var def = JsonBeanDecoder.create(vmDef.data().toString())
402                    .readObject();
403                def.setField("userPermissions",
404                    permissions(vmDef, channel.session()).stream()
405                        .map(Permission::toString).toList());
406                channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
407                    model.getConletId(), "updateVmDefinition", def));
408            } catch (JsonDecodeException e) {
409                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
410                    () -> "Failed to serialize VM definition");
411            }
412        });
413    }
414
415    @Override
416    protected void doConletDeleted(ConletDeleted event,
417            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, ViewerModel conletState)
418            throws Exception {
419        if (event.renderModes().isEmpty()) {
420            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().delete(
421                storagePath(channel.session(), conletId)));
422        }
423    }
424
425    /**
426     * Track the VM definitions.
427     *
428     * @param event the event
429     * @param channel the channel
430     * @throws JsonDecodeException the json decode exception
431     * @throws IOException 
432     */
433    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
434    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ConfusingTernary", "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
435        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
436        "PMD.ConfusingArgumentToVarargsMethod" })
437    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
438            throws JsonDecodeException, IOException {
439        var vmDef = new VmDefinitionModel(channel.client().getJSON()
440            .getGson(), event.vmDefinition().data());
441        GsonPtr.to(vmDef.data()).to("metadata").get(JsonObject.class)
442            .remove("managedFields");
443        var vmName = vmDef.getMetadata().getName();
444        if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED) {
445            channelManager.remove(vmName);
446        } else {
447            channelManager.put(vmName, channel, vmDef);
448        }
449        for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
450            var connection = entry.getKey();
451            for (var conletId : entry.getValue()) {
452                var model = stateFromSession(connection.session(), conletId);
453                if (model.isEmpty()
454                    || !Objects.areEqual(model.get().vmName(), vmName)) {
455                    continue;
456                }
457                if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED) {
458                    connection.respond(
459                        new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
460                } else {
461                    updateVmDef(connection, model.get());
462                }
463            }
464        }
465    }
466
467    @Override
468    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidDecimalLiteralsInBigDecimalConstructor",
469        "PMD.ConfusingArgumentToVarargsMethod", "PMD.NcssCount" })
470    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
471            ConsoleConnection channel, ViewerModel model)
472            throws Exception {
473        event.stop();
474        var both = Optional.ofNullable(model.vmName())
475            .flatMap(vm -> channelManager.both(vm));
476        if (both.isEmpty()) {
477            return;
478        }
479        var vmChannel = both.get().channel;
480        var vmDef = both.get().associated;
481        var vmName = vmDef.metadata().getName();
482        var perms = permissions(vmDef, channel.session());
483        var resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
484        switch (event.method()) {
485        case "selectedVm":
486            model.setVmName(event.params().asString(0));
487            String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
488            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(storagePath(
489                channel.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
490            updateConfig(channel, model);
491            break;
492        case "start":
493            if (perms.contains(Permission.START)) {
494                fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Running", vmChannel));
495            }
496            break;
497        case "stop":
498            if (perms.contains(Permission.STOP)) {
499                fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Stopped", vmChannel));
500            }
501            break;
502        case "reset":
503            if (perms.contains(Permission.RESET)) {
504                confirmReset(event, channel, model, resourceBundle);
505            }
506            break;
507        case "resetConfirmed":
508            if (perms.contains(Permission.RESET)) {
509                fire(new ResetVm(vmName), vmChannel);
510            }
511            break;
512        case "openConsole":
513            if (perms.contains(Permission.ACCESS_CONSOLE)) {
514                var pwQuery = Event.onCompletion(new GetDisplayPassword(vmDef),
515                    e -> e.password().ifPresent(
516                        pw -> openConsole(vmName, channel, model, pw)));
517                fire(pwQuery, vmChannel);
518            }
519            break;
520        default:// ignore
521            break;
522        }
523    }
524
525    private void openConsole(String vmName, ConsoleConnection connection,
526            ViewerModel model, String password) {
527        var vmDef = channelManager.associated(vmName).orElse(null);
528        if (vmDef == null) {
529            return;
530        }
531        var addr = displayIp(vmDef);
532        if (addr.isEmpty()) {
533            logger.severe(() -> "Failed to find display IP for " + vmName);
534            return;
535        }
536        var port = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.data()).get(JsonPrimitive.class, "spec",
537            "vm", "display", "spice", "port");
538        if (port.isEmpty()) {
539            logger.severe(() -> "No port defined for display of " + vmName);
540            return;
541        }
542        var proxyUrl = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.data()).get(JsonPrimitive.class, "spec",
543            "vm", "display", "spice", "proxyUrl");
544        StringBuffer data = new StringBuffer(100)
545            .append("[virt-viewer]\ntype=spice\nhost=")
546            .append(addr.get().getHostAddress()).append("\nport=")
547            .append(Integer.toString(port.get().getAsInt()))
548            .append("\npassword=").append(password).append('\n');
549        proxyUrl.map(JsonPrimitive::getAsString).ifPresent(u -> {
550            if (!Strings.isNullOrEmpty(u)) {
551                data.append("proxy=").append(u).append('\n');
552            }
553        });
554        connection.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
555            model.getConletId(), "openConsole", "application/x-virt-viewer",
556            Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(data.toString().getBytes())));
557    }
558
559    private Optional<InetAddress> displayIp(K8sDynamicModel vmDef) {
560        var server = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.data()).get(JsonPrimitive.class, "spec",
561            "vm", "display", "spice", "server");
562        if (server.isPresent()) {
563            var srv = server.get().getAsString();
564            try {
565                var addr = InetAddress.getByName(srv);
566                logger.fine(() -> "Using IP address from CRD for "
567                    + vmDef.getMetadata().getName() + ": " + addr);
568                return Optional.of(addr);
569            } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
570                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e, () -> "Invalid server address "
571                    + srv + ": " + e.getMessage());
572                return Optional.empty();
573            }
574        }
575        var addrs = GsonPtr.to(vmDef.data()).getAsListOf(JsonPrimitive.class,
576            "nodeAddresses").stream().map(JsonPrimitive::getAsString)
577            .map(a -> {
578                try {
579                    return InetAddress.getByName(a);
580                } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
581                    logger.warning(() -> "Invalid IP address: " + a);
582                    return null;
583                }
584            }).filter(a -> a != null).toList();
585        logger.fine(() -> "Known IP addresses for "
586            + vmDef.getMetadata().getName() + ": " + addrs);
587        return addrs.stream()
588            .filter(a -> preferredIpVersion.isAssignableFrom(a.getClass()))
589            .findFirst().or(() -> addrs.stream().findFirst());
590    }
591
592    private void confirmReset(NotifyConletModel event,
593            ConsoleConnection channel, ViewerModel model,
594            ResourceBundle resourceBundle) throws TemplateNotFoundException,
595            MalformedTemplateNameException, ParseException, IOException {
596        Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
597            .getTemplate("VmViewer-confirmReset.ftl.html");
598        channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), model.getConletId(),
599            processTemplate(event, tpl,
600                fmModel(event, channel, model.getConletId(), model)))
601                    .addOption("cancelable", true).addOption("closeLabel", "")
602                    .addOption("title",
603                        resourceBundle.getString("confirmResetTitle")));
604    }
605
606    @Override
607    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleConnection channel,
608            String conletId) throws Exception {
609        return true;
610    }
611
612    /**
613     * The Class VmsModel.
614     */
615    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
616    public static class ViewerModel extends ConletBaseModel {
617
618        private String vmName;
619        private boolean generated;
620
621        /**
622         * Instantiates a new vms model.
623         *
624         * @param conletId the conlet id
625         */
626        public ViewerModel(@JsonProperty("conletId") String conletId) {
627            super(conletId);
628        }
629
630        /**
631         * Gets the vm name.
632         *
633         * @return the vmName
634         */
635        @JsonGetter("vmName")
636        public String vmName() {
637            return vmName;
638        }
639
640        /**
641         * Sets the vm name.
642         *
643         * @param vmName the vmName to set
644         */
645        public void setVmName(String vmName) {
646            this.vmName = vmName;
647        }
648
649        /**
650         * Checks if is generated.
651         *
652         * @return the generated
653         */
654        public boolean isGenerated() {
655            return generated;
656        }
657
658        /**
659         * Sets the generated.
660         *
661         * @param generated the generated to set
662         */
663        public void setGenerated(boolean generated) {
664            this.generated = generated;
665        }
666
667    }
668}
